Posts.Content: Mar 7, 2014 04:54PM Landerson3237 wrote: i was diagnosed with stage IV breast cancer in 2013. I had it in both lungs. I underwent months if AC chemotherapy and then weekly Taxol. I have had the mastectomy and lymph node removal. I am now on Tamoxifen. Last week I got the news that I was in Remission and there is no sign of it anywhere. There is always hope. I have been told that my positive attitude had a lot to do with it as well. Life goes on and somewhere out there is always someone worse off.  Its been a hard battle but its been worht it.
Posts.Title: Stage IV-Can you go into remission, or be cured? amontro Landerson3237
